message.FMCG: Mom-and-pop stores can get anything from Beers to Instant Noodles with a single source.
message.Homeware: Home appliance store owners, source everything you need from Plastics to Refrigerators.
message.Pharmacy: A single source of medicines to medical equipments from trusted brands for Pharmacies.
message.Lifestyle: Offering high quality products from cosmetic and fashion brands to wholesalers.
zaloApp.genuineProductsSubText: By partnering with brands, we ensure the best deals for our retailers.
zaloApp.proposition2SubText: Enjoy 24-hour delivery for free and track your order on our Zalo Store.
zaloApp.proposition3SubText: Pay only when you are satisfied with the received products.
Reviews.title: Why our retailers love us
Reviews.subTitle: Hear what our customers have to say about their experience with Telio
Reviews.review1: Best thing about Telio is that the prices and promotions are transparent to all retailers. I can order anywhere anytime via the Telio Zalo Store
Reviews.review2: I can order via Telio Zalo Store and track the order status to know when I can receive the products. But anyway, Telio delivers in only 24h so don't need to track much
Reviews.review3: It's very pleased to know that Telio also cares about helping me managing store better. I don't have to use notebook for debts, orders management anymore thanks to Teliobooks
telioBooksBanner.title: Teliobooks
telioBooksBanner.message: Manage your debt and purchase order with a single mobile application.
investors.title: WE ARE BACKED BY VISIONARY INVESTORS
investors.subTitle: Telio is backed by some of the most respectable investors

zaloPay.introDescription: Recieve QR Code and pay your order from Telio at time of delivery
zaloPay.paymentDescription1: To pay via ZaloPay, customer just need to open Zalo application and screen QR code provided by shipper.
zaloPay.paymentDescription2: Choose connected bank and deposit in just few seconds!
zaloPay.switchDescription: Customer can switch between pay in cash and pay via ZaloPay at time of delivery
zaloPay.benefitsDescription: Apart from using ZaloPay to make payment to Telio, customer can use Zalopay for other utilities: pay bills for store or shopping
zaloPay.instruction1: Place Telio orders via Zalo, salesperson or call center
zaloPay.instruction2: When receiving the goods, access the Zalo or ZaloPay application to scan
zaloPay.instruction3: Screen QR code from Telio given by shipper
